text:
This place was fun!
I want to come back again!

Oh, that!
look at this, Producer-san!

Hmm? Oh, that's...
a message board.

But it has posters on it,
so you can't leave a message.

Not many people use message boards, so
maybe they're using it as a bulletin board.

I see...
How long do you think it'll stay here?

I hope it'll still be here
until I come back next time.

When I come back next time,
I'll leave a message.
